channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- DB2 for Linux- UNIX and Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- DB2 for Linux- UNIX and Windows

item.title: CVE-2021-29702|2024-08-03T22:18:01.448Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux-%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1.4 and 11.5.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service as the server terminates abnormally when executing a specially crafted SELECT statement. IBM X-Force ID: 200658.
